name: La Brute, la Bonne et le Truand
name_original: La Brute, la Bonne et le Truand
description:
La Brute, la Bonne et le Truand is a competitive casual shooter. You have to kill your opponent the first. However when you shoot a bullet, you have to reload your guns with a touch combinaison.

If you shoot in the head, you do more damages.

Inputs :

Player 01 : ZQSD to reload and Space Bar to shoot.

Player02 : Arrows to reload and CTRL to shoot.

Programmers : Thomas Pretat, Valentin Gras

Graphics : Alexandra Desnoyer
